phrs.translation: 颚音化, 颚化, 舌前化

sentences.sentence: Voicing and palatalization as well as aspiration are all distinctive in Mongolian.
sentences.translation: 在蒙古语中，发声、吐字、吐字、吐字都很有特色。

sentences.sentence: Aspiration is the main distinctive feature of consonants in Chinese, whereas voicing and palatalization as well as aspiration are all distinctive in Mongolian.
sentences.translation: 而在蒙古语中，送气与不送气、清与浊、软与硬都是重要的区别性特征；
